title: Cops on the search for rape suspect
text:
The Cape Town Family Violence, Child Protection and Sexual Offences Unit is requesting assistance with the tracing of an alleged rapist.

On Wednesday 8 August at about 15:30, an 11-year-old girl was walking in Mount Road, Zonnebloem, near the new District Six Hospital, when she was approached from behind by an unknown coloured man. The man allegedly pulled her into a white panel van where he allegedly raped her and later, at around 16:50, dropped her off in Harrington Street.

The suspect is estimated to be in his late 20s with an average build and height. The suspect’s upper teeth are missing.
